title: ITAM - Cisco IT Asset Management
description: Cisco Users need to enter forecasts for their IT Asset requirements, link their Procurement Orders as and when those are created and view data in Dashboard. Create Templates -> Enter Asset Forecast Intake Forms -> Enter Purchase Orders -> Enter Purchase Orders Line Items. The planning to leverage it's Digital Cloud Platform's (DCP) accelerators for Cloud Native application development which are pre-built for various Business Industry Domain Blueprints.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap Framework, AngularJS 1.X, Angular 13.X

title: ACE - Advanced Cisco Experience Launchpad
description: The project is a responsive web application named as ACE Launchpad. It's one stop for ordering, registering, provisioning, de-provisioning and retiring of devices. Key features of our project are Bot integration for 24 x 7 support, UMaaS i.e. User Management as a service, this features helps to provide all the necessary access to a new joiner which earlier use to take more than 2-3 hours now with the advent of UMaaS it can be done in seconds, Manage Another's Account, this feature is to help user when they are new to the platform.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap Framework, AngularJS 1.X, Angular 13.X

title: Power Pack
description: Power Pack for WebEx Teams is a collection of tools that can help you automate repetitive tasks in your spaces. Power Pack Features - Invites [multiple people to new existing space], Broadcast [send message to multiple spaces], Exodus [remove users from spaces], Export [Export members to file or clone to another space], Team Space Manager [Create and manage your team spaces]

title: M1
description: M1 Limited is a Network Service Provider in Singapore providing Mobile Services (postpaid and prepaid), Fiber Broadband and Digital Voice Services.

title: PiRuby
description: Discover Educational Content from Textbooks. Learning and Excellence Made Easy. PiRuby seamlessly works for any syllabus textbooks. The difficulty of the videos and quizzes presented are matched to the difficulty of the topics in that textbook page of that class and syllabus. Teachers, Parents & Students of Class 8th to 12th are loving PiRuby.
feature: PiRuby Features Instantly obtain multimedia educational content for any text book topic. Millions of online educational content made accessible for the first time Get top recommendations for any textbook topic using Patented algorithm eLearning content adapted to difficulty level of your syllabus textbooks and your learning speed Visual note taking through concept maps Build your own library of educational videos, quiz or notes Share videos, quiz & notes with your friends
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS 1.X, Electron, Ionic Framework v1.X

title: Carter
description: Carter is an excellent and reliable pre-booked service to transfer luggage to and from Bangalore airport. Our meet and greet service is personalized and is highly professional. The end to end service is fully insured. The pick up and drop service is diverse and personalized to the needs of every traveler: Family, Business, Leisure or Group. We provide a fully transparent and green transaction.
feature: Booking online (email) and offline (SMS) confirmations once you make a booking. The carter allocated to pick your order at location specified/airport will be allocated with picture and number (for easy identification). The carter will wait with a board at the arrival area for easy identification. Rest easy on the flight knowing that there is a carter allocated to pull the weight for you. The luggage is weighed, images are taken and carefully packed in tamper-proof bags for transit. The handles and trolleys will no longer be available once we pack the luggage. The luggage then is bar-coded and images of the same are uploaded. All images are available for view in each order under 'Manage Orders' section of the application. The carter allocated is uniformed and will take your digital signature once the order is completed.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS 1.X, Ionic Framework v1.X

technologies: HTML5, CSS3 AngularJS 1.X, Electron, Ionic Framework v1.X

title: Syngene

Our multi-disciplinary skills in integrated drug discovery and development include capabilities in medicinal chemistry, biology, in vivo pharmacology, toxicology, custom synthesis, process R&D, cGMP manufacturing, formulation and analytical development along with Clinical development services.

title: Giga

At the same time, there are many organizations and investors who want to give back. We bring these two groups together.

All this by itself only is the part of the solution. Michi looks at culture and employee engagement within the context of a linked and aligned HR tools and processes.
